citation: Proclamation under the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Amendment Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Amendment Act 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Amendment Act 2016 fix 1 January 2017 as the day on which that Act commences.

8 November 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MATTHEW GROOM

Minister for State Growth

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 November 2016

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
